p: Again, although C. limon is the furthest variety of C. paradisi, there are compounds reported in C. paradisi and also in C. limon such as the compound undecanoic acid [ C. paradisi ( Lin and Rouseff, 2001; Njoroge et al., 2005b), C. sinensis ( Njoroge et al., 2005a; Sawamura et al., 2005), and C. limon ( Cannon et al., 2015)].
